Title: Haier opens US$400m Thai factory
Summary: THAILAND: Chinese air conditioning manufacturer Haier has officially opened its new US$400m factory in Chonburi, Thailand.

Title: MVR heat pump offers CO2-free steam generation
Summary: GERMANY: Chemical company BASF has broken ground on a new formic acid plant in Ludwigshafen that will use one of the largest industrial heat pumps…

Title: Joint guide on Ecodesign requirements for fans
Summary: BELGIUM/CZECH REPUBLIC: A new guide has been published to address common questions on the interpretation of Ecodesign requirements for fans as set out in EU regulation 2024/1834.

Title: Daikin plans to produce heat exchangers using recycled aluminium
Summary: JAPAN: Daikin is looking to produce air conditioner heat exchangers made from recycled aluminium after perfecting horizontal recycling technology.

Title: Bluu Unit adds KKL Holding GmbH
Summary: GERMANY: Bluu Unit, a group of refrigeration, air conditioning and ventilation firms, has signed an agreement to acquire Düsseldorf-based contractor KKL Holding GmbH.

Title: Bosch halts Polish heat pump factory plans
Summary: GERMANY/POLAND: German manufacturer Bosch has announced the suspension of its €280m investment in a new heat pump factory in Poland.

Title: Acquisitions create major refrigeration group
Summary: ITALY: A group with a turnover of nearly €80m has been formed following the acquisition of Padua-based refrigeration equipment manufacturer Criocabin and Brianza-based refrigerated display case manufacturer CierreEsse.

Title: Two dead in Iowa legionnaires’ disease outbreak
Summary: USA: A second fatality has been reported in the legionnaires’ disease outbreak in Marshalltown, Iowa.

Title: £5.5m funding for AC in homes impact study
Summary: UK: A groundbreaking study into the impact of air conditioning in homes and offices on the UK power grid has secured £5.5m funding from Ofgem’s Strategic Innovation Fund (SIF).

Title: Samsung adds Duftons as distributor
Summary: UK: Samsung Climate Solutions has appointed Yorkshire-based plumbing and heating merchant Duftons Plumbing & Heating Supplies as its latest distributor.

Title: ADA appoints Eaton-Smith as technical project director
Summary: UK: Abbey Design Associates (ADA), the Cheltenham-based refrigeration design and project management consultancy, has appointed Conor Eaton-Smith as its new technical project director.

Title: Copeland ammonia chiller has dairy date
Summary: USA: Copeland has supplied its Vilter VQ95 single-screw industrial ammonia heat pump to global dairy processor Saputo for its facility in in Abbotsford, British Columbia.

Title: Carrier R290 heat pump secures hotel booking
Summary: UK: The Radisson Hotel Manchester City Centre has become the first hospitality venue in the UK to install Carrier Commercial HVAC’s new R290 AquaSnap 61AQ heat pumps.
